Song.title: Stronger
Song.copyright: Ben Fielding | Reuben Morgan, Â© 2007 Hillsong Publishing (Admin. in U.S. & Canada by Integrity's Hosanna! Music)

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [F G C/E F G C/E]
Verse 1: There is L[F]ove that c[G]ame f[C]or us Humbled [F]to a [G]sin-[C]ner's cross You broke my sh[F]ame and [G]sinful[Am]ness You rose ag[F]ain vic-[G]tori-o[F]us
Instrumental 1: [F G C/E C F G C/E]
Verse 2: Fai[C]thful-n[F]ess none [G]can d[C/E]eny Thr[C]ough the st[F]orm and thr[G]ough [C/E]the fire Th[C]ere is tr[F]uth that s[G]ets me fr[Am]ee Je[G]sus Ch[F]rist who l[G]ives in [C]me
Chorus: [G]You are str[C]onger You are str[G]onger Sin is b[Am]roken You have s[F]aved me It is wr[C]itten Christ is ri[G]sen Jesus Y[F]ou are L[G]ord [F]of all
Instrumental 2: [F G C/E C F G C/E]
{new_page} Verse 3: [C]No begi[F]nning [G]and [C]no end You're my h[F]ope and [G]my de[C]fense You came to s[F]eek and s[G]ave [Am]the lost You paid [G]it [F]all up[G]on the cr[C]oss
Chorus: [(G)]You are str[C]onger You are str[G]onger Sin is b[Am]roken You have s[F]aved me It is wr[C]itten Christ is ri[G]sen Jesus Y[F]ou are L[G]ord [F]of all
Instrumental 3: [F Am G C/E G/B]
BRIDGE: So let Your N[F]ame be lifted higher [Am] Be lifted [G]higher [C] [C] Be lifted higher [G] [(Repeat)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 there is love that came for us humbled to a sinners cross you broke my shame and sinfulness you rose again victorious instrumental 1 verse 2 faithfulness none can deny through the storm and through the fire there is truth that sets me free jesus christ who lives in me chorus you are stronger you are stronger sin is broken you have saved me it is written christ is risen jesus you are lord of all instrumental 2 verse 3 no beginning and no end youre my hope and my defense you came to seek and save the lost you paid it all upon the cross chorus you are stronger you are stronger sin is broken you have saved me it is written christ is risen jesus you are lord of all instrumental 3 bridge so let your name be lifted higher be lifted higher be lifted higher
